content: The basketball collective are currently on the United Kingdom leg of their latest worldwide tourThe Harlem Globetrotters displayed supreme athleticism and skills in Birmingham to leave fans entrancedMail Sport takes you behind the scenes as the most famous basketball team in the world playWelcome back to the Soul of Sport. In this episode of the series, KEVIN QUIGLEY was at Birmingham's Utilita Arena to take in the world's most famous basketball team - the Harlem Globetrotters.

The basketball collective are currently embarking on the UK leg of their world tour, and emerged from the darkness to dazzle awe-inspired fans with their supreme athleticism, interspersed with funny skits and outrageous dunks.Our man was on hand to shoot the best of the action. The photographs were taken with Nikon Z9 cameras with lenses, Nikon 24/70mm 2.8 and Nikon 70-200mm 2.8.
